Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent of the fight among the Shaheen Bagh women protesters, presenting it as a widespread issue when it was a localized incident.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the fight over payment for participating in protests actually occurred.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the fight over payment is indicative of the entire protest movement, which may not be accurate.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the video, as it was originally reported to be a result of a traffic accident in Bhopal, unrelated to the Shaheen Bagh protests.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video has been circulating since January 2019, before the passing of the Citizenship Amendment Act, suggesting that it is not related to the anti-CAA/NRC protests.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in this particular claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times bias in this particular claim.
